name: Model Building Restoration
description:
Disassemble old car models, remove rust, repaint and reassemble.

You have to disassemble the model of the car into parts, remove the rust and paint it in new colors, and then put the car back together. You can also put it on the ground and plant trees.

Using the mouse and keyboard, the player needs to disassemble the rusty car into parts and decompose them so that to remember where which part was, then you need to clean each part of the rust and paint, then assemble the car in parts back, the more accurately the player collects the car, the more points he will receive.
Then the player can create a panorama for the car by placing a piece of land and trees under it.
